resources.string: Effortlessly send notifications from your terminal to your Android device 💻📲
Perfect for long-running build/deploy jobs when you want to grab a ☕️
Terminal not set up to use Yo yet?
Already have a Yo QR Code ready?
Want to change the device that\'s paired with Yo?
Give it a whirl! Invoke the yo command-line tool to send a notification to your phone!
You\'ve successfully paired Yo with your computer!
